name: Tetouris
description:
This game is a classic puzzle type game

It has 9 levels of speed and a max score of 999999.

It has 9 block palettes (1 palette for each level). Each palette has 3 different blocks.

[Changelog]

-> Created evaluate game button 
-> Added sfx
-> Increased the speed

Feel free to contact me, whether it is report a bug or for help.
mail: g.br0ken.m1nd@gmail.com
